metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2085 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in apps/files_trashbin/index.php in ownCloud Server before 5.0.6 allows remote authenticated users to access arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the dir parameter.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2085` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> owncloud packages in Ubuntu are now empty

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
